alert.note: Alert for Florence; Forest; Oneida; Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 20 at 2:10PM CST until December 21 at 6:00PM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 6 PM TUESDAY... .A fast-moving clipper system will bring a quick 2 to 5 inches of snow accumulation to far northern Wisconsin on Tuesday. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 6 PM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 5 inches. Highest accumulations near the Upper Michigan border. * WHERE...Oneida, Vilas, Florence and Forest Counties. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 6 PM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday evening commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
